title: YT Jeffsy 29er Ungaged 14: This is How You Spec a Bike
content:
YT just announced a Jeffsy UNCAGED ($4,999) in a stunning paint job with a build spec to match. Leading us to ask for more silver in complete builds, please…

This is what YT’s UNCAGED project is all about – a limited-edition, one-off build. The UNCAGED 14 uses the 150mm JEFFSY platform as a canvas with a custom-painted Ultra Modulus carbon frame as the base, YT handpicked each component for its capability, feel, and function.

Equipping an Öhlins suspension package for rich traction on loose terrain, a Crankbrothers x Industry Nine wheelset, and a proven Shimano XT mechanical drivetrain for crisp, tactile shifts. For the bling, YT added a limited-edition “Purple Hayes” Dominion A4 brakes, while 5Dev R-Spec cranks and a Title cockpit add an aftermarket touch. To top it off, some Title AH1 silver bars tie the build together, all for $4,999.

Check out the full stunning package at YT and read Travis’ review in our archives.

The post YT Jeffsy 29er Ungaged 14: This is How You Spec a Bike appeared first on The Radavist.
author: John Watson
